segments.text: IBA , Maria speaking . How can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I called earlier regarding interest rates on loans . Sorry , I just have a couple more questions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm here to help . Tell me your questions and I'll do my best to answer them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if I require a loan for a short period of time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What repayment period were you thinking of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say , 6 months ? Or less in fact . I want to repay the loan ASAP ; I don't like debt hanging over my head .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A wise decision . If you decide to take out a short-term loan with us , say for 6 months or less , the interest rate shall be for that of a 6 - month loan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if I repay it early . Any perks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we could adjust the interest rate based on the original rate and the amount of days you actually borrowed the money for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , the quicker I pay it back , the more I can save in interest ? That's excellent . Thanks so much for your information . I'll come in shortly to take the relevant steps for the loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's our pleasure . We are always happy to have another satisfied customer . Thanks for calling . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
